message: oEmbed support would be really awesome.
Under which circumstances can work convore with HTTPS and oembed work together? If oEmbed providers support https as well?
well they can turn https://convore.com/ into a oembed endpoint for any URL and do the oembed lookup server-side.
are we talking about embedding convore conversations, or embedding linked assets in convore conversations. i wouldn't think that the https would matter in the second case...
